title: Blood Money
description: Violet is a college student at home for summer break. Between her social awkwardness and inability to get along with her stepmom, she wishes she could be anywhere but home for the summer. Lucas is a wealthy recent college graduate looking to be better than his self-obsessed parents. He decided to spend the summer with his aunt and bumped into the most beautiful woman he’s ever met. Their summer gets even more complicated when a murder occurs in their small, coastal town. When Violet’s dad is accused of the crime, she puts aside her social insecurities to team up with the hot new guy in town.Her instant attraction to the easygoing man doesn’t make the investigation easy, especially since he seems to feel the same attraction for her. Will Lucas be able to convince her to act on those feelings, and will he be able to do it before they solve the murder?Tropes include:•Sunshine MMC•Forced Proximity•Instant Attraction•He Falls First•Slow BurnThis book is a semi-slow burn romance. Explicit scenes 18+.
author: Emily Kinsman
